meta.name: Analyze Webpages with Landing Page Analyzer AI & Generate Google Docs Reports

parameters.content:
# ðŸš€ Automated Webpage Analyzer & Google Docs Report Generator  

## Description  
This **n8n workflow** analyzes any webpage URL using the [Landing Page Analyzer API](https://rapidapi.com/), reformats the insights into a professional **Conversion Audit Report**, and automatically saves the results into **Google Docs** for easy sharing and record-keeping.  

---

## ðŸ”„ Workflow Nodes (Step by Step)  

1. **On form submission** â€“ Collects the webpage URL from a simple form.  
2. **WebPage Analyzer (API Call)** â€“ Sends the URL to the Landing Page Analyzer API (via RapidAPI) to get an SEO & conversion-focused audit.  
3. **Reformat (Code Node)** â€“ Transforms the API response into a structured Markdown-style audit report (with grade, strengths, suggestions, and score breakdown).  
4. **Upload In Google Docs** â€“ Inserts the formatted report directly into a pre-configured Google Doc for permanent storage and collaboration.  

---

## âœ¨ Benefits  
- Fully automated **SEO & Conversion Audit reports**  
- Saves results directly to **Google Docs** (no manual copy-paste)  
- Scalable and reusable for multiple websites  
- Great for **SEO agencies, freelancers, and digital marketers**  

---

**On form submission**  
   Captures the website URL entered by the user through a form trigger.  
   This acts as the starting point for the entire workflow.

**WebPage Analyzer (API Call)**  
   Sends the captured URL to the Landing Page Analyzer API via RapidAPI.  
   Retrieves audit details like grade, score, suggestions, and strengths.

**Reformat (Code Node)**  
   Processes the API response into a clean, human-readable audit report.  
   Organizes sections into suggestions, strengths, and conversion score breakdown.

**Upload In Google Docs**  
   Inserts the formatted audit report into a pre-configured Google Document.  
   Ensures reports are stored, shareable, and accessible for collaboration.
